verses.verse: And after <S%G3326><s%> the uproar <S%G2351><s%> was ceased, <S%G3973><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> to him the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and embraced <S%G782><s%> them, and departed <S%G1831><s%> for to go <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia. <S%G3109><s%>

And when he had gone <S%G1330><s%> over <S%G1330><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> parts, <S%G3313><s%> and had given them much <S%G4183><s%> exhortation, <S%G3870><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Greece, <S%G1671><s%>

And there stayed <S%G4160><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> months. <S%G3376><s%> And when the Jews <S%G2453><s%> laid <S%G1096><s%> wait <S%G1096><s%> <S%G1917><s%> for him, as he was about <S%G3195><s%> to sail <S%G321><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Syria, <S%G4947><s%> he purposed <S%G1096><s%> <S%G1106><s%> to return <S%G5290><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Macedonia. <S%G3109><s%>

And there accompanied <S%G4902><s%> him into <S%G891><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%> Sopater <S%G4986><s%> of Berea; <S%G960><s%> and of the Thessalonians, <S%G2331><s%> Aristarchus <S%G708><s%> and Secundus; <S%G4580><s%> and Gaius <S%G1050><s%> of Derbe, <S%G1191><s%> and Timotheus; <S%G5095><s%> and of Asia, <S%G773><s%> Tychicus <S%G5190><s%> and Trophimus. <S%G5161><s%>
These <S%G3778><s%> going <S%G4281><s%> before <S%G4281><s%> tarried <S%G3306><s%> for us at <S%G1722><s%> Troas. <S%G5174><s%>

And we sailed <S%G1602><s%> away <S%G1602><s%> from Philippi <S%G5375><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of unleavened <S%G106><s%> bread, and came <S%G2064><s%> to them to Troas <S%G5174><s%> in five <S%G4002><s%> days; <S%G2250><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> we stayed <S%G1304><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> days. <S%G2250><s%>

And on the first <S%G3391><s%> day of the week, <S%G4521><s%> when the disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4863><s%> together <S%G4863><s%> to break <S%G2806><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> preached <S%G1256><s%> to them, ready <S%G3195><s%> to depart <S%G1826><s%> on the morrow; <S%G1887><s%> and continued <S%G3905><s%> his speech <S%G3056><s%> until <S%G3360><s%> midnight. <S%G3317><s%>
And there were many <S%G2425><s%> lights <S%G2985><s%> in the upper <S%G5253><s%> chamber, <S%G5253><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> they were gathered <S%G4863><s%> together. <S%G4863><s%>

And there sat <S%G2521><s%> in a window <S%G2376><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> young <S%G3494><s%> man <S%G3494><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Eutychus, <S%G2161><s%> being fallen <S%G2702><s%> into a deep <S%G901><s%> sleep: <S%G5258><s%> and as Paul <S%G3972><s%> was long <S%G1909><s%> <S%G4119><s%> preaching, <S%G1256><s%> he sunk <S%G2702><s%> down <S%G2736><s%> with sleep, <S%G5258><s%> and fell <S%G4098><s%> down from the third <S%G5152><s%> loft, <S%G5152><s%> and was taken <S%G142><s%> up dead. <S%G3498><s%>

And Paul <S%G3972><s%> went <S%G2597><s%> down, <S%G2597><s%> and fell <S%G1968><s%> on <S%G1968><s%> him, and embracing <S%G4843><s%> him said, <S%G2036><s%> Trouble <S%G2350><s%> not yourselves; for his life <S%G5590><s%> is in him.

When he therefore <S%G3767><s%> was come <S%G305><s%> up again, and had broken <S%G2806><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> and eaten, <S%G1089><s%> and talked <S%G3656><s%> a long <S%G2425><s%> while, even till <S%G891><s%> break <S%G827><s%> of day, <S%G827><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> he departed. <S%G1831><s%>
And they brought <S%G71><s%> the young <S%G3816><s%> man alive, <S%G2198><s%> and were not a little <S%G3357><s%> comforted. <S%G3870><s%>

And we went <S%G4281><s%> before <S%G4281><s%> to ship, <S%G4143><s%> and sailed <S%G321><s%> to Assos, <S%G789><s%> there <S%G1564><s%> intending <S%G3195><s%> to take <S%G353><s%> in Paul: <S%G3972><s%> for so <S%G3779><s%> had he appointed, <S%G1299><s%> minding <S%G3195><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> to go afoot. <S%G3978><s%>
And when <S%G5613><s%> he met <S%G4820><s%> with us at <S%G1519><s%> Assos, <S%G789><s%> we took <S%G353><s%> him in, and came <S%G2064><s%> to Mitylene. <S%G3412><s%>

And we sailed <S%G636><s%> there, <S%G1564><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> the next <S%G1966><s%> day over <S%G481><s%> against <S%G481><s%> Chios; <S%G5508><s%> and the next <S%G2087><s%> day we arrived <S%G3846><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> Samos, <S%G4544><s%> and tarried <S%G3306><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Trogyllium; <S%G5175><s%> and the next <S%G2192><s%> day we came <S%G2064><s%> to Miletus. <S%G3399><s%>

For Paul <S%G3972><s%> had determined <S%G2919><s%> to sail <S%G3896><s%> by Ephesus, <S%G2181><s%> because <S%G3704><s%> he would <S%G1096><s%> not spend <S%G5551><s%> the time <S%G5551><s%> in Asia: <S%G773><s%> for he hurried, <S%G4692><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> it were possible <S%G1415><s%> for him, to be at <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of Pentecost. <S%G4005><s%>
And from Miletus <S%G3399><s%> he sent <S%G3992><s%> to Ephesus, <S%G2181><s%> and called <S%G3333><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%> of the church. <S%G1577><s%>

And when <S%G5613><s%> they were come <S%G3854><s%> to him, he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, You know, <S%G1987><s%> from the first <S%G4413><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> that I came <S%G1910><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Asia, <S%G773><s%> after <S%G4459><s%> what manner <S%G4458><s%> I have been <S%G1096><s%> with you at all <S%G3956><s%> seasons, <S%G5550><s%>

Serving <S%G1398><s%> the LORD <S%G2962><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> humility <S%G5012><s%> of mind, and with many <S%G4183><s%> tears, <S%G1144><s%> and temptations, <S%G3986><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> befell <S%G4819><s%> me by the lying in wait <S%G1917><s%> of the Jews: <S%G2453><s%>

And how <S%G5613><s%> I kept <S%G5288><s%> back <S%G5288><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> that was profitable <S%G4851><s%> to you, but have <S%G2192><s%> showed <S%G312><s%> you, and have <S%G2192><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> you publicly, <S%G1219><s%> and from house <S%G3624><s%> to house, <S%G3624><s%>

Testifying <S%G1263><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> to the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> and also <S%G2532><s%> to the Greeks, <S%G1672><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and faith <S%G4102><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

And now, <S%G3568><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> I go <S%G4198><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> in the spirit <S%G4151><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> not knowing <S%G1492><s%> the things that shall befall <S%G4876><s%> me there: <S%G1722><s%>

Save <S%G4133><s%> that the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> witnesses <S%G1263><s%> in every <S%G2596><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> that bonds <S%G1199><s%> and afflictions <S%G2347><s%> abide <S%G3306><s%> me.

But none <S%G3762><s%> of these things <S%G3056><s%> move <S%G3056><s%> <S%G4160><s%> me, neither <S%G3761><s%> count <S%G2192><s%> I my life <S%G5590><s%> dear <S%G5093><s%> to myself, <S%G1683><s%> so <S%G5613><s%> that I might finish <S%G5048><s%> my course <S%G1408><s%> with joy, <S%G5479><s%> and the ministry, <S%G1248><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> to testify <S%G1263><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And now, <S%G3568><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> that you all, <S%G3956><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> gone <S%G1330><s%> preaching <S%G2784><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> shall see <S%G3700><s%> my face <S%G4383><s%> no <S%G3765><s%> more. <S%G3765><s%>
Why <S%G1352><s%> I take you to record <S%G3143><s%> this <S%G4594><s%> day, <S%G4594><s%> that I am pure <S%G2513><s%> from the blood <S%G129><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> men.
For I have <S%G2192><s%> not shunned <S%G5288><s%> to declare <S%G312><s%> to you all <S%G3956><s%> the counsel <S%G1012><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Take heed <S%G4337><s%> therefore to yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> and to all <S%G3956><s%> the flock, <S%G4168><s%> over <S%G1722><s%> the which <S%G3739><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> has made <S%G5087><s%> you overseers, <S%G1985><s%> to feed <S%G4165><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he has purchased <S%G4046><s%> with his own <S%G2398><s%> blood. <S%G129><s%>

For I know <S%G1492><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> that after <S%G3326><s%> my departing <S%G867><s%> shall grievous <S%G926><s%> wolves <S%G3074><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> in among <S%G1519><s%> you, not sparing <S%G5339><s%> the flock. <S%G4168><s%>

Also <S%G2532><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> own selves <S%G846><s%> shall men <S%G435><s%> arise, <S%G450><s%> speaking <S%G2980><s%> perverse <S%G1294><s%> things, to draw <S%G645><s%> away <S%G645><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> them.

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> watch, <S%G1127><s%> and remember, <S%G3421><s%> that by the space <S%G5148><s%> of three <S%G5148><s%> years <S%G5148><s%> I ceased <S%G3973><s%> not to warn <S%G3560><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> and day <S%G2250><s%> with tears. <S%G1144><s%>

And now, <S%G3568><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> I commend <S%G3908><s%> you to God, <S%G2316><s%> and to the word <S%G3056><s%> of his grace, <S%G5485><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> to build <S%G2026><s%> you up, and to give <S%G1325><s%> you an inheritance <S%G2817><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> them which are sanctified. <S%G37><s%>
I have <S%G2192><s%> coveted <S%G1937><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man's <S%G3762><s%> silver, <S%G694><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> gold, <S%G5553><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> apparel. <S%G2441><s%>

Yes, <S%G1161><s%> you yourselves <S%G846><s%> know, <S%G1097><s%> that these <S%G3778><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> ministered <S%G5256><s%> to my necessities, <S%G5532><s%> and to them that were with me.

I have <S%G2192><s%> showed <S%G5263><s%> you all <S%G3956><s%> things, how that so <S%G3779><s%> laboring <S%G2872><s%> you ought <S%G1163><s%> to support <S%G482><s%> the weak, <S%G770><s%> and to remember <S%G3421><s%> the words <S%G3056><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> how <S%G3754><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> It is more <S%G3122><s%> blessed <S%G3107><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> than to receive. <S%G2983><s%>
And when he had thus <S%G5023><s%> spoken, <S%G2036><s%> he kneeled <S%G5087><s%> <S%G1119><s%> down, and prayed <S%G4336><s%> with them all. <S%G3956><s%>
And they all <S%G3956><s%> wept <S%G1096><s%> <S%G2805><s%> sore, <S%G2425><s%> and fell <S%G1968><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> Paul's <S%G3972><s%> neck, <S%G5137><s%> and kissed <S%G2705><s%> him,

Sorrowing <S%G3600><s%> most <S%G3122><s%> of all <S%G3122><s%> for the words <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he spoke, <S%G2046><s%> that they should <S%G3195><s%> see <S%G2334><s%> his face <S%G4383><s%> no <S%G3765><s%> more. <S%G3765><s%> And they accompanied <S%G4311><s%> him to the ship. <S%G4143><s%>
